amendment.description: To require a report on the provision of an electronic copy of military records to members of the Armed Forces upon their discharge or release from the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4409 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4409 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6351) To require a report on the provision of an electronic copy of military records to members of the Armed Forces upon their discharge or release from the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4409 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4409 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Obama.
